name: Usaka Rings
description:
Delve into this epic adventure with the iconic characters from the comics of the Usaka Family ©!

The family mascot, the beloved octopus Takomaru, was destroyed by the terrible Tablin. To resurrect it, you must collect all the rings scattered by more than 6 worlds. You can choose from over 60 characters! Each of them represents a previous or current family comic.

A game full of action and puzzles, you must solve riddles, fight monsters and bosses, with a time limit. 8-bit retro style, inspired by games like Legend of Zelda, Adventures of Lolo and Boxworld.

Familia Usaka © is a publisher of independent comics. The characters that appear in the game belong to their respective authors.

Completely free application for recreational purposes (without ads or addons). Does not require special permits. Does not require internet connection. Mobile and PC version.

Boneman Studio © 2019
